thirdInfoData.title: A good dish is identified in the ingredients that are used to make it
thirdInfoData.subtitle: Not only we study where our food comes from, we know who makes it. And how they work. The search for everything that enters our kitchen is accurate, maniacal, traceable.
thirdInfoData.second_subtitle: We do not compromise, to ensure that what comes out of the kitchen is tasty, satisfying, flawless.
thirdInfoData.label: Get to know us

aboutPage.heading: Quality ingredients and a magical atmosphere. This is the combination on which we have built the spirit of our restaurant.
aboutPage.paragraphOne: A good dish is identified in the raw materials that are used to make it. We don't just study where they come from. We know who produces them. And how it does it. The search for everything that enters our kitchen is accurate, maniacal, traceable. We do not compromise, to ensure that what comes out of the kitchen is tasty, satisfying, flawless.
aboutPage.paragraphTwo: The project is studied in detail. We have studied a menu that enhances the Italian tradition, without remaining anchored by it, exploring and playing with innovation, challenging the rules. We believe that, in this period, it is not necessary to eat more meat, but to eat it better, consciously. This is why we aim for an aware customer, who can read and trace what arrives at his table, on his plate. Through a constantly updated QR code, the quality becomes palpable, you can touch it with your hand, you can read it with your eyes, even before your palate.

restaurantPage.heading: Disocver Nabucco's History, in the heart of Rome
restaurantPage.paragraphOne:
The history of Nabucco has ancient and deep roots. Ours is a place that has been able to change many garments over the years, always maintaining its majesty. What today houses our restaurant was a handcrafted ceramic factory, a world-famous laboratory that took the name of Tanagra, in honor of the Greek city where the first colored ceramics were found, the Tanagrine, in fact. And it is precisely the name Tanagra that has been taken up by our restaurant, which opened its doors for the first time in 1997 and which for 24 years has welcomed and delighted the palates of many. 
 
 Today Tanagra changes its name and becomes Nabucco, more than ever ready to renew itself and to open new paths, focusing on a modern and contemporary meat menu, without sacrificing the quality and values ​​that have always marked it.
restaurantPage.paragraphTwo:
We are not newcomers in the restaurant world. We are not newbies who enter the kitchen excited about their first experience. We do not think about frightened evenings, unaware of what awaits us. We are those who made the restaurant, the territory has known for years, already has clear ideas about the kitchen. We are here to show you. 
 
 In the kitchen, the hands of a team work together, united by the passion and care for good food. The same ideas and the same culinary art boil, focused on craftsmanship, seasonality, taste.
restaurantPage.secondParagraphOne: After 20 years of experience alongside Alessandro Borghese, it’s time to go home, where it all began for me. Mine was an entirely Roman apprenticeship, I explored, known and tasted the territory from an early age thanks to the kitchen. A cuisine that has grown over time, which has led me to become Executive Chef at “The luxury of simplicity”, in Milan and which now draws me into a new project, mine. For me, there is no single concept of cuisine: cultures, ingredients and flavors mix and question each other, giving life, for each dish, to something unique but above all, tasty.

executivePage.heading: Would you like a space reserved for your company dinner or a special birthday?
executivePage.paragraphOne: Nabucco is ready to greet you, fill out the form and we will get back to you in 48h with our best option.
